title: BRIEF-Torex Gold Says Well On Track To Achieve FY Outlook
text:
BRIEF-Torex Gold Says Well On Track To Achieve FY Outlook

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 06:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Torex Gold Says Well On Track To Achieve FY Outlook Oct 3 (Reuters) - Torex Gold Resources Inc : * TOREX GOLD RESOURCES INC - CO IS WELL ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE FULL YEAR GUIDANCE OF 430,000 OUNCES OF GOLD SOLD (+/- 7%) * TOREX GOLD RESOURCES INC - WILL BEGIN ACCRUING CORPORATE TAX ON A CURRENT BASIS, DUE UTILIZATION OF TAX LOSS CARRY-FORWARDS DURING QUARTER

BRIEF-Torex Gold Says Well On Track To Achieve FY Outlook
